content:
Sure, here's an updated professional summary for Christina Hyde's resume:

---

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Results-driven Customer Service Trainer with 8 years of experience in training development and project management. Well-organized, purposeful, and detailed customer care professional with healthcare expertise in call center operations. Possesses a customer-centric approach and is highly skilled in providing quality service to clients. Currently an Allstate Apprentice with AskHR providing customer service support to employees and their families. Recognized for achieving a 100% satisfaction score in February 2023. Also possesses knowledge of company policies and procedures, KB system navigation, and Cronos. Earned an AA degree from Kennedy King College and is pursuing a BA in HR/Accounting at Chicago State University.
